mapper.select: select * from anchor_realtime where anchor_id = #{anchorId} and time between DATE_ADD(#{datetime}, interval -1 DAY) and #{datetime}Q
select * from anchor_history where anchor_id = #{anchorId} and date = #{date}
select * from anchor_history where anchor_id = #{anchorId} and date between #{begin} and #{end} limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from anchor_history where anchor_id = #{anchorId} and date between #{begin} and #{end}

select anchor_id, avg(watch_num) as watch_num, sum(gift) as gift, avg(bullet_screen) as bullet_screen, max(watch_num) as max_watch_num, date_add(#{date}, interval -1 day) as date from anchor_realtime where time between date_add(#{date}, interval -1 day) and #{date} group by anchor_id
